title: Erik Voorhees advises Apple to tap into Bitcoin to ‘make a billion instantly”
description:
Several crypto stakeholders have advised Apple, the iPhone maker, to invest in Bitcoin. In a Feb. 16 post on the social media platform X (formerly Twitter), Shapeshift CEO and founder Erik Voorhees urged the technology company to quietly “buy several billion of BTC” and make the top crypto a payment method in its Apple Pay […]

The post Erik Voorhees advises Apple to tap into Bitcoin to ‘make a billion instantly” appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Arkham Intelligence uncovers nearly all of MicroStrategy’s on-chain Bitcoin holdings
description:
Crypto Intelligence firm Arkham Intelligence has reportedly identified on-chain addresses containing 98% of MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin holdings. According to a Feb. 16 post on social media platform X (formerly Twitter), MicroStrategy, which recently repositioned itself into a BTC development company, holds 107,000 BTC of the top digital asset with Fidelity, while 79,000 BTC is held in […]

The post Arkham Intelligence uncovers nearly all of MicroStrategy’s on-chain Bitcoin holdings appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin SKYROCKETS Above $52k, Which Crypto Next?
description: Uncover the mysteries of the cryptocurrency realm as the market soars above $1 trillion with Bitcoin's surge past $52k. Aptos introduces a mysterious feature boosting user trust, trending bullish in the short term but harboring long-term risks. Meanwhile, Polkadot's proposed token burning creates anticipation for potential price surges, yet caution prevails in the enigmatic world of crypto. Navigate the uncertainties, seize opportunities, and unravel the secrets of this dynamic market.

title: Revolut unveils new crypto exchange tailored for advanced traders
description: Digital bank Revolut has announced the introduction of a new cryptocurrency exchange specifically designed for “advanced traders.” This development was disclosed through a customer email highlighting Revolut’s efforts to cater to its more sophisticated customer base segment. Revolut, known for its innovative financial solutions, currently provides basic crypto services to its vast clientele of over […]

title: Microsoft Considers Expanding Major Franchises to Rival Platforms
description: In a move that could reshape the landscape of video game exclusivity, Microsoft is reportedly exploring the possibility of bringing some of its most significant franchises, including Gears of War, the upcoming Doom installment, and Microsoft Flight Simulator, to competing platforms. This information comes from Tom Warren of The Verge, who sheds light on Microsoft’s […]

title: H100 GPUs from Nvidia Are Delivered Fast Now
description: Unlock insights into Nvidia's AI GPU market as wait times decrease, hinting at a potential growth peak.

title: Kelexo poised to outshine Tron and Cardano in blockchain sector
description: Kelexo is set to surpass Tron and Cardano as the first decentralized web3 loan platform, connecting lenders and borrowers without intermediaries. Leading cryptocurrencies Tron (TRX) and Cardano (ADA) have had notable peaks but are now struggling for consistent positive price…

title: Aptos Foundation Unveils JamboPhone: $99 Web3 Device Opens Digital Economy in 40+ Countries
description: Aptos Foundation and Jambo have launched the JamboPhone at $99 to bring Web3 technology to emerging markets. title: Will BEAM Bounce Back After $5.14M kirilm.eth Phishing Scandal?
description:
The stolen BEAM was converted for 1,629 ETH, unsettling the BEAM market. Post-phishing, BEAM sees volume surge, hinting at potential market stabilization. kirilm.eth loses 180.25M BEAM ($5.14M) to a phishing attack, sparking a 7% market drop. kirilm.eth was involved in a phishing attack that took place on February 15, costing them 180.25 million BEAM, worth […]

The post Will BEAM Bounce Back After $5.14M kirilm.eth Phishing Scandal? appeared first on Coin Edition.
